sentence: The Home Depot declared a first quarter cash dividend of $1.03 per share.
The dividend is payable on June 14, 2018, to shareholders of record on the close of business on May 31, 2018.
Altria's Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.70 per share, payable on July 10, 2018, to shareholders of record as of June 15, 2018.
CSX Corporation ( CSX ) approved a $0.22 per share quarterly dividend on the Company's common stock.
The dividend is payable on June 15, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 31, 2018.
Crown Castle International ( CCI ) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.05 per common share.
The quarterly dividend will be payable on June 29, 2018 to common stockholders of record at the close of business on June 15, 2018.

Weyerhaeuser Company ( WY ) declared a dividend of $0.32 per share on the common stock of the company, payable in cash on June 22, 2018 to holders of record of such common stock as of the close of business on June 8, 2018.
The Hartford declared a quarterly dividend of $0.25 per share of common stock, payable on July 2, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 1, 2018.
